title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: When modifying the default value in the list box of a report parameter, the default value is lost. This occurs even though the modification is saved and the dialog is closed. When reopening the Edit Parameter dialog, the modified default value is not displayed.
OB: The modified default value is not displayed in the Edit Parameter dialog after reopening it.
EB: The Edit Parameter dialog should display the modified default value for the list box report parameter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default. 
3. Click OK to save the settings. 
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 
5. Modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK without closing the dialog. 
6. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog again and observe the default value.
